exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.description: A classic bodyweight exercise targeting the chest, shoulders, and triceps
exercises.instructions: Start in plank position, lower body until chest nearly touches floor, push back up

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.description: A fundamental lower body exercise for quadriceps, glutes, and hamstrings
exercises.instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, lower hips back and down, return to standing

exercises.name: Pull-ups
exercises.description: Upper body exercise targeting the latissimus dorsi, rhomboids, and biceps
exercises.instructions: Hang from bar with overhand grip, pull body up until chin clears bar, lower with control

exercises.name: Planks
exercises.description: Isometric core exercise for building stability and strength
exercises.instructions: Hold straight line from head to heels, supported on forearms and toes

exercises.name: Burpees
exercises.description: High-intensity full-body exercise combining squat, plank, and jump
exercises.instructions: Squat down, jump back to plank, do push-up, jump feet to hands, jump up with arms overhead

exercises.name: Bench Press
exercises.description: Classic compound exercise for chest, shoulders, and triceps
exercises.instructions: Lie on bench, lower bar to chest with control, press up to full arm extension

exercises.name: Deadlifts
exercises.description: Compound movement targeting hamstrings, glutes, back, and core
exercises.instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart, hinge at hips, lift bar keeping back straight

exercises.name: Running
exercises.description: Cardiovascular exercise for endurance and leg strength
exercises.instructions: Maintain steady pace, land midfoot, keep cadence around 180 steps per minute

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.description: High-intensity exercise combining cardio and core strengthening
exercises.instructions: Start in plank position, alternate bringing knees to chest rapidly

exercises.name: Lunges
exercises.description: Unilateral exercise targeting quadriceps, glutes, and hamstrings
exercises.instructions: Step forward, lower back knee toward ground, push back to starting position

exercises.name: Overhead Press
exercises.description: Vertical pressing movement for shoulders and triceps
exercises.instructions: Press bar from shoulder level to overhead, keep core tight throughout

exercises.name: Rowing (Machine)
exercises.description: Low-impact cardio exercise engaging multiple muscle groups
exercises.instructions: Drive with legs, pull handle to chest, return with control
